children.text:
Version 3.3.3 - Jan 15, 2016

• Updated location service
• Minor bug fixes

Version 3.3.2 - Oct 22, 2015

• Optimized for Android 6.0
• Support for Nexus 5X

Version 3.3.1 - Mar 26, 2015

• Auto units detection
• Removed top speed limit

Version 3.3.0 - Mar 25, 2015

• Added Nexus 6 support
• Updated background service

Version 3.2.1 - Mar 21, 2015

• Fixed satellite grid
• Optimized for Android 5.x (Lollipop)

Version 3.2.0 - Jan 1, 2014

• More track logging options
• GPX files now contain the <speed> tag
• Better integration with Maverick

Version 3.1.6 - Dec 2, 2013

• Optimized for Android 4.4 (KitKat)

Version 3.1.5 - Aug 14, 2013

• App can now be used on tablets
• Fixed: Time zone issue in GPX export

v.3.1.2-3.1.4 - May 2013

• Support for bigger screens (1920x1080)
• Fixed several minor bugs

Version 3.1.1 - Apr 25, 2013

• Improved track recording
• Added option to clear the log file
• GPX files now contain track segments

Version 3.1.0 - Mar 22, 2013

• New hybrid speedo layout
• Added option to invert indicator colors
• Keep running when the screen is locked
• Minor bug fixes and improvements

Version 3.0 - Jul 30, 2012

• Updated interface design
• Support for extra high-density screens
• New customizable speedo graphics
• User-selectable indicator views
• Smooth compass and speedo animation
• Automatic GPX export option
• New algorithm for GPS filtering
• Service now runs in the foreground
• Auto switch to GPS heading option
• Better organized settings screen
• Support for 1280×720 resolution
• Android 4.1 (Jelly Bean) compatibility
• Many other tweaks under the hood

Version 2.9 - Feb 5, 2012

• Simple text widget (4x1)
• Quickly adjust speed limits
• Improved background service
• More color customization
• Other minor improvements

Version 2.8 - Oct 21, 2011

• Quickly switch speed limits
• Share your location
• Support for 10-inch screens
• Featured apps section
• Fixed: Multiple bugs on Honeycomb
• Numerous minor tweaks

Version 2.7 - Jul 14, 2011

• Basic Honeycomb support
• Enable screen auto-rotation
• Maximum digital speedo limit
• Show additional data on the digital gauge
• Updated speed limit presets
• Lots of minor improvements

Version 2.6 - Mar 24, 2011

• Digital speedo gauge
• Improved GPX export
• Vibration alert
• Reverse landscape mode (Android 2.3)
• Many bug fixes and UI tweaks

Version 2.5 - Nov 9, 2010

• 0 to 100 km/h time
• Improved car acceleration modes
• The app now restores the recording state
• Fixed: Alert sound bug on some phones

Version 2.4 - Oct 8, 2010

• 0 to 60 mph time
• Quarter mile time
• Stop/Start recording data
• Quickly reset distance and max speed
• Reset colors to default values

Version 2.3 - Sep 25, 2010

• Orientation sensor compass
• Advanced zoom mode
• Zoom/HUD color options

Version 2.2 - Aug 28, 2010

• New track logging algorithm
• Zoom view added
• Fixed: Problem with background service

Version 2.1 - Aug 18, 2010

• Move to SD Card support
• Changelog added
• Fixed: Force closes in landscape mode

Version 2.0 - Aug 17, 2010

• Run in the background
• GPX track export
• Average speed
• Time traveled
